transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Oh yes, ma'am, very good morning. Yes, ma'am, very good morning.
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Uh, yeah, calling you from IndiaMART, ma'am.
Customer: Okay, just can you wait for one second?

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes, ma'am.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes, hello.
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Am I audible? Yes, yes, I'm speaking.
Customer: Hello. Hello, can you hear me? Hello.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Are you audible?
Executive: Yes, I am I audible to you?
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: So yesterday we had an interaction over the same, right?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: So you said that you will talk to ma'am and then update me the same, right? So for that only I have called.
Customer: Okay. What are you discussing with that meeting?
Executive: Yesterday I had got with you or someone else?
Customer: No, no, I was not joining that meeting.
Executive: See, Iris Electronics, right?
Customer: Yeah, this is Iris Electronics.
Executive: Yesterday I had interaction with some of you, like one of your team members and she said that she will talk to ma'am and then confirm because my mail we received from your end, right?
Customer: Okay. Okay. Uh, I will inform your ledger. Okay.
Executive: First I will discuss with that person, okay?
Executive: Yesterday you only spoke to me or someone else?
Customer: No, no, no, someone.
Customer: Mai chahti hu talk to you.
Executive: So please give the phone to her so that I can talk to her.
Customer: Okay, okay.

Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello. Yeah. Same Deepika.
Executive: How yesterday I had got with you, ma'am?
Customer: Ha, yeah.
Executive: Can I get your good name?
Customer: My name is Aadhira.
Executive: Uh, ma'am, please Aadhira.
Customer: Aadhira.
Customer: Yeah.
Executive: Okay. Yes, ma'am, you said that you will talk to ma'am and then update. The report I have given to her, she is not her health condition is not well. Like she told to inform me that like we will this required or arrange something like that because they are also asking for the sales security amount.
Executive: So I know. I know that but what our owners are saying only I can inform, right? We are not informing from our side, right?
Executive: So anything can be done or you arrange a call back from our side because the thing is that that's something which is very much evident that we cannot provide, right?
Executive: I know, I can understand but from our owner's side what they are saying only I can follow that, right? I can't say it like we don't want or we Whatever they are informing only we can inform you also, right? Because they are saying the amount.
Customer: Uh, your point is also not wrong but the thing is that I being the representative I know that that is something which is not possible from our end. According to your pin code it is implied. Everything is implied according to the pin code, right? Pin code is falling in non serviceable area which means
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay, so what should because I will just check and by end of the day I can give you what to say because I can't say it from my end or what to be decided, right?
Customer: Right, so we agree with you. So that is why I gave you yesterday's yesterday because today only she came to she came to our office. So I can't directly go and ask. I have to inform what you guys have informed. So I will just check with her and I will I will only give you a call back. Okay? Within before afternoon.
Customer: So if you do not call then shall I call you by 3:00 p.m.?
Executive: Uh, sure, sure. I will just check with her and I'll ask what to do, what is the procedure to get it done or what to say. So I will just check and update you.
Customer: Okay.
Customer: Okay, thank you.
Executive: Yeah, sure, bye.
Customer: Hello?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants an update on a previous interaction.

- Customer's pin code falls in non-serviceable area.



Resolution:

- Executive will check with her manager.

- Executive will call back before afternoon.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back if no response by 3PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- pin code, non-serviceable area, call back
